metadata.title: CVE-2024-27393 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:xen-netfront: Add missing skb_mark_for_recycle Notice thatskb_mark_for_recycle() is introduced later than fixes tag in commit6a5bcd84e886 ("page_pool: Allow drivers to hint on SKB recycling"). It isbelieved that fixes tag were missing a call to page_pool_release_page()between v5.9 to v5.14, after which is should have usedskb_mark_for_recycle(). Since v6.6 the call page_pool_release_page() wereremoved (in commit 535b9c61bdef ("net: page_pool: hidepage_pool_release_page()") and remaining callers converted (in commit6bfef2ec0172 ("Merge branch'net-page_pool-remove-page_pool_release_page'")). This leak became visiblein v6.8 via commit dba1b8a7ab68 ("mm/page_pool: catch page_pool memoryleaks").

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-27393` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-2-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-4.4.0-2-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-4.4.0-2-lowlatency - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-4.4.0-2-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-4.4.0-2-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-4.4.0-2-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-4.4.0-2-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-2-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
No subscription required

linux-image-4.8.0-39-generic - 4.8.0-39.42~16.04.1
linux-image-4.8.0-39-generic-lpae - 4.8.0-39.42~16.04.1
linux-image-4.8.0-39-lowlatency - 4.8.0-39.42~16.04.1
linux-image-extra-4.8.0-39-generic - 4.8.0-39.42~16.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1007-kvm - 4.4.0-1007.12
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1001-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1001-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1031-aws - 4.15.0-1031.33~16.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.11.0-1015-azure - 4.11.0-1015.15
linux-image-extra-4.11.0-1015-azure - 4.11.0-1015.15
No subscription required

linux-image-extra-4.10.0-1004-gcp - 4.10.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1008-oracle - 4.15.0-1008.10~16.04.1
No subscription required
